entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
